text: Allahanu nim'ma panthadinda nam'mannu raksisida balika navu matte adaredege maralidare navu allahana mele ondu bhari sullaropavannu horisidantaditu. Higirutta nam'modeyanada allahane icchisuva tanaka, adaredege maralalu namage sadhyavilla. Nam'modaneyana jnanavu ellavannu avarisikondide. Navu allahanalli sampurna bharavase ittiruvevu. Nam'modeya, niniga nam'ma hagu nam'ma janangada naduve satyadondige tirmana madibidu. Ninu atyuttama tirmana maduvavanagiruve
